title: Global stocks and US futures rally on coronavirus hopes, oil slips back
title_page: Global stocks and US futures rally on coronavirus hopes, oil slips back  - CNN
maintext:
New York/Hong Kong/London (CNN Business) Global stocks and US futures surged on Monday as new data suggested that efforts to contain the coronavirus pandemic may be starting to pay off in Spain, Italy and New York.
Nikkei 225 N225 Hang Seng Index HSI FTSE 100 UKX DAX DAX CAC 40 CAC40 Australia's S&P/ASX 200 and Japan'sgained more than 4% and Hong Kong'srose 2.2%. Markets in mainland China were closed for a public holiday. European stocks rallied in early trading. Theadded more than 3% at the open, while Germany'ssurged 4.2% and France'sincreased 3.5%.
Global markets moved higher after Spain reported 674 deaths from the coronavirus on Sunday, the lowest daily rise since early March, and Italy recorded its lowest death rate within a 24-hour period in two weeks with 525 fatalities.
The number of deaths in New York state has also begun dropping "for the first time," Andrew Cuomo said on Sunday. But the governor cautioned that it's too early to tell whether this means the state has passed the peak.
